name: Shin Galaxy - Alpha War
description:
Shin galaxy: Alpha War is a space shooter with some RPG mechanics, where the player can improve the attributes of each space ship. In addition, the player will be able to count on other space ships, which will have unique stats. The game has more than 25 stages, content to unlock, boss battles, 08 ships and 60 missions to complete. There is also infinite mode to test your survival skills.

Gameplay



  • Laser Shot
The common ship shot, simply hit it on enemy ships and you will be good.





  • Charged Shot
The shot with immense damage per second potential, however, needs to be charged before it can be fired. The projectile passes through enemies with incredible speed.






  • Bomb
The bomb is a projectile that does high single damage on hit and can also destroy certain objects.


Ships


The ships available for use were created using geometric shapes, each one has its own particularity, as well as an improved version.

  • Ignis Series
This model has its stats balanced, which facilitates combat in Shin Galaxy.





  • Aqua Series
This model stands out in its fire rate, on the other hand, it is very sensitive.





  • Terra Series
This model has the highest attack power among the other spaceships, however, it has low locomotion speed.





  • Tonitruum Series
This model is the one with the highest speed of locomotion, however, it has the lowest bomb capacity.





Now, go and explore the Shin Galaxy.
